notes: Users can now click on a vehicle photo/icon within an event in the Race Schedule to directly open the Edit Vehicle modal.
Fixed a defect where default vehicle icons in the Upcoming Events list were causing a 404 error and were not clickable.
Updated the 'Edit' and 'Delete' buttons in Vehicle Management to use icons instead of text for a cleaner UI.
Fixed a defect where default vehicle icons in the Upcoming Events list were not clickable.
